021import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.YamlDocument;
022import dev.dejvokep.boostedyaml.block.implementation.Section;
023import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
024import net.tnemc.core.account.Account;
025import net.tnemc.core.account.PlayerAccount;
026import net.tnemc.core.account.SharedAccount;
027import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.HoldingsEntry;
028import net.tnemc.core.account.shared.Member;
029import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.account.AccountLoadCallback;
030import net.tnemc.core.api.callback.account.AccountSaveCallback;
031import net.tnemc.core.api.response.AccountAPIResponse;
032import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
033import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.log.DebugLevel;
034import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.id.UUIDPair;
035import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.Datable;
036import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.storage.StorageConnector;
037import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.IOUtil;
038import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
039import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
040
041import java.io.File;
042import java.io.FileInputStream;
043import java.io.IOException;
044import java.util.ArrayList;
045import java.util.Collection;
046import java.util.Map;
047import java.util.Optional;
048import java.util.UUID;
049
050/**
051 * YAMLAccount
052 *
053 * @author creatorfromhell
054 * @since 0.1.2.0
055 */
056public class YAMLAccount implements Datable<Account> {
057
058  /**
059   * The class that is represented by the O parameter.
060   *
061   * @return The class that represents the parameter.
062   */
063  @Override
064  public Class<? extends Account> clazz() {
065
066    return Account.class;
067  }
068
069  /**
070   * USed to purge the objects of this datable.
071   *
072   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
073   */
074  @Override
075  public void purge(final StorageConnector<?> connector) {
076    //TODO: Yaml Purge
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Used to store this object.
081   *
082   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
083   * @param account   The object to be stored.
084   */
085  @Override
086  public void store(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final Account account, @Nullable final String identifier) {
087
088    //MISCUtils.printStack();
089
090    PluginCore.log().debug("Saving Account with ID: " + identifier + " Name: " + account.getName(), DebugLevel.STANDARD);
091
092    //check if our file is in use.
093    final String file = "accounts/" + identifier + ".yml";
094    while(TNECore.yaml().inUse(file)) {
095
096      try {
097        Thread.sleep(1000);
098      } catch(final InterruptedException e) {
099        e.printStackTrace();
100      }
101    }
102
103    TNECore.yaml().add(file);
104
105    final File accFile = new File(PluginCore.directory(), file);
106    if(!accFile.exists()) {
107      try {
108        accFile.createNewFile();
109      } catch(final IOException ignore) {
110
111        PluginCore.log().error("Issue creating account file. Account: " + account.getName(), DebugLevel.OFF);
112        return;
113      }
114    }
115
116
117    YamlDocument yaml = null;
118    try {
119      yaml = YamlDocument.create(accFile);
120    } catch(final IOException ignore) {
121
122      PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading account file. Account: " + account.getName(), DebugLevel.OFF);
123      return;
124    }
125
126    yaml.set("Info.ID", account.getIdentifier().toString());
127    yaml.set("Info.Name", account.getName());
128    yaml.set("Info.Type", account.type());
129    yaml.set("Info.Status", account.getStatus().identifier());
130    yaml.set("Info.CreationDate", account.getCreationDate());
131    yaml.set("Info.Pin", account.getPin());
132
133    if(account instanceof final PlayerAccount playerAccount) {
134      yaml.set("Info.LastOnline", playerAccount.getLastOnline());
135    }
136
137    if(account instanceof final SharedAccount shared) {
138      final String owner = (shared.getOwner() == null)? account.getIdentifier().toString() :
139                           shared.getOwner().toString();
140
141      yaml.set("Info.Owner", owner);
142
143      for(final Member member : shared.getMembers().values()) {
144        for(final Map.Entry<String, Boolean> entry : member.getPermissions().entrySet()) {
145
146          yaml.set("Members." + member.getId().toString() + "." + entry.getKey(), entry.getValue());
147        }
148      }
149    }
150    try {
151
152      yaml.save();
153
154      final AccountSaveCallback callback = new AccountSaveCallback(account);
155      PluginCore.callbacks().call(callback);
156
157      yaml = null;
158    } catch(final IOException ignore) {
159      PluginCore.log().error("Issue saving account file. Account: " + account.getName());
160      return;
161    }
162    TNECore.yaml().remove(file);
163
164    TNECore.instance().storage().storeAll(account.getIdentifier().toString());
165  }
166
167  /**
168   * Used to store all objects of this type.
169   *
170   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
171   */
172  @Override
173  public void storeAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
174
175    for(final Account account : TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values()) {
176      store(connector, account, account.getIdentifier().toString());
177    }
178  }
179
180  /**
181   * Used to load this object.
182   *
183   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
184   * @param identifier The identifier used to identify the object to load.
185   *
186   * @return The object to load.
187   */
188  @Override
189  public Optional<Account> load(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final String identifier) {
190
191    final File accFile = new File(PluginCore.directory(), "accounts/" + identifier + ".yml");
192    if(!accFile.exists()) {
193      PluginCore.log().error("Null account file passed to YAMLAccount.load. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
194      return Optional.empty();
195    }
196    return load(accFile, identifier);
197  }
198
199  public Optional<Account> load(final File accFile, final String identifier) {
200
201    if(accFile == null) {
202
203      PluginCore.log().error("Null account file passed to YAMLAccount.load. Account: " + identifier, DebugLevel.OFF);
204      return Optional.empty();
205    }
206    try {
207
208      try(final FileInputStream fis = new FileInputStream(accFile)) {
209
210        final YamlDocument yaml = YamlDocument.create(fis);
211
212        if(yaml != null) {
213
214          Account account = null;
215
216          //Validate account file
217          if(!yaml.contains("Info.Name") || !yaml.contains("Info.Type")) {
218
219            PluginCore.log().error("Invalid account file. Account: " + identifier + ". You may need to remove this account file! This is due to a previous server crash or improper shutdown and not a bug.", DebugLevel.OFF);
220            return Optional.empty();
221          }
222
223          final String type = yaml.getString("Info.Type");
224
225          //create our account from the type
226          final AccountAPIResponse response = TNECore.eco().account().createAccount(identifier,
227                                                                                    yaml.getString("Info.Name"),
228                                                                                    !(type.equalsIgnoreCase("player") ||
229                                                                                      type.equalsIgnoreCase("bedrock")));
230          if(response.getResponse().success() && response.getAccount().isPresent()) {
231
232            //load our basic account information
233            account = response.getAccount().get();
234
235            account.setStatus(TNECore.eco().account().findStatus(yaml.getString("Info.Status")));
236            account.setCreationDate(yaml.getLong("Info.CreationDate"));
237            account.setPin(yaml.getString("Info.Pin"));
238          }
239
240          if(account != null) {
241
242            if(account instanceof final PlayerAccount playerAccount) {
243              playerAccount.setLastOnline(yaml.getLong("Info.LastOnline"));
244            }
245
246            if(account instanceof final SharedAccount shared && yaml.contains("Members")) {
247
248              final Section section = yaml.getSection("Members");
249              for(final Object memberObj : section.getKeys()) {
250
251                final String member = (String)memberObj;
252                for(final Object permissionObj : section.getSection(member).getKeys()) {
253
254                  final String permission = (String)permissionObj;
255                  shared.addPermission(UUID.fromString(member), permission,
256                                       yaml.getBoolean("Members." + member +
257                                                       "." + permission));
258                }
259              }
260            }
261
262            final Collection<HoldingsEntry> holdings = TNECore.instance().storage().loadAll(HoldingsEntry.class, identifier);
263            for(final HoldingsEntry entry : holdings) {
264              account.getWallet().setHoldings(entry);
265            }
266
267            final AccountLoadCallback callback = new AccountLoadCallback(account);
268            PluginCore.callbacks().call(callback);
269          }
270
271          return Optional.ofNullable(account);
272        }
273      }
274    } catch(final Exception ignore) {
275
276      PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading account file. Account: " + identifier + ". You may need to remove this account file! This is due to a previous server crash or improper shutdown and not a bug.", DebugLevel.OFF);
277      return Optional.empty();
278    }
279
280    return Optional.empty();
281  }
282
283  /**
284   * Used to load all objects of this type.
285   *
286   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
287   *
288   * @return A collection containing the objects loaded.
289   */
290  @Override
291  public Collection<Account> loadAll(final StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier) {
292
293    final Collection<Account> accounts = new ArrayList<>();
294
295    for(final File file : IOUtil.getYAMLs(new File(PluginCore.directory(), "accounts"))) {
296
297      try {
298        final Optional<Account> loaded = load(file, file.getName().replace(".yml", ""));
299        if(loaded.isPresent()) {
300          accounts.add(loaded.get());
301          TNECore.eco().account().uuidProvider().store(new UUIDPair(loaded.get().getIdentifier(), loaded.get().getName()));
302        }
303      } catch(final Exception ignore) {
304        PluginCore.log().error("Issue loading account file. File: " + file.getName() + ". You may need to remove this account file! This is due to a previous server crash or improper shutdown and not a bug.", DebugLevel.OFF);
305      }
306    }
307    return accounts;
308  }
309}
